name: Avoid SQL with queries on more than 4 Tables (PeopleSoft)
description: Queries on a large number of tables can cause performance problems.
rationale: Rules of construction of query to improve performances
remediation: Review the design of the query to reduce the number of involved Tables.
alternativeName: Avoid SQL with queries on more than 4 Tables (PeopleSoft)

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
